title: broadbandServiceDetailItemRequest
description: Details of an broadband service. These details are used for Serviceability Requests.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Broadband Service Detail.

accessMedium.description: The type of media the service being detailed should delivered over (e.g. FIBER, COAX, TWISTED_PAIR).

accessTechnology.description: The underlying technology used to transmit data across the Access Medium (e.g., DOCSIS_3.0).

serviceLevelAgreement.description: The standard level of service provided as part of the product.

pricingTerm.description: The length of the service contract in months

activationDate.description: The desired activation date for the service.

dhcpSupport.description: Specify whether DHCP services are desired as a part of the service.

bridgeMode.description: Specify whether routers should be configured in bridge mode as part of the service.

staticIpAddresses.description: Identify the maximum number of Static IP addresses requested with the service.

publicIpV4Addresses.description: Identify the number of dynamically assigned public IPv4 addresses requested as part of the service.

publicIpV6Addresses.description: Identify the number of dynamically assigned public IPv6 addresses requested as part of the service.

objectType.description: Identifies the specific type of object being represented. In this case, broadbandServiceDetailItemRequest.
